catalog.title: The Caves of Steel
catalog.author: Isaac Asimov
catalog.description: The growth of humanity is dependant on humans overcoming their irrational antagonism toward robots.

catalog.title: The City and the Stars
catalog.author: Arthur C. Clarke
catalog.description: The inhabitants of Diaspar believe their domed city is all that remains of an empire that had once conquered the stars.
catalog.forecast: Future Technolody Foretold: Immersive virtual reality.

catalog.title: Cyborg
catalog.author: Martin Caidin
catalog.description: An astronaut's body is destroyed in a catastrophic accident. He is rebuilt with experimental technology.

catalog.title: Farenheit 451
catalog.author: Ray Bradbury
catalog.description: Guy Montag is a fireman. His job is to destroy the most illegal of commodities, the printed book. After meeting Clarisse, he begins to question everything he has ever known.
catalog.forecast: Future Technology Foretold: Earbuds, flatscreen television, automated teller machine.

catalog.title: The Machine Stops
catalog.author: E. M. Forster
catalog.description: The human population has lost the ability to live on the surface of the Earth. Each individual now lives in isolation below ground in a standard room, with all bodily and spiritual needs met by the omnipotent, global Machine.
catalog.forecast: Future Technology Foretold: Television, Home automation (smart home), internet, instant messaging, social media.

catalog.title: Men Like Gods
catalog.author: H. G. Wells
catalog.description: Mr. Barnstaple finds himself in a utopian parallel universe.

catalog.title: Metropolis
catalog.author: Thea von Harbou
catalog.description: A technologically advanced city is sustained by the existence of an exploited class of laborers who live underground, far away from the gleaming surface world.

catalog.title: Neuromancer
catalog.author: William Gibson
catalog.description: Set in the future, we follow Henry Case, a washed-up hacker hired for one last job, which brings him in contact with a powerful artificial intelligence.
catalog.forecast: Future Technology Foretold: World Wide Web, virtual reality.

catalog.title: Space Cadet
catalog.author: Robert Heinlein
catalog.description: Coming of age tale taking place in an outer space military academy.

catalog.title: Ubik
catalog.author: Philip K. Dick
catalog.description: A mind-bending, classic about the perception of reality.
catalog.forecast: Future Technology Foretold: Internet of Things.
